SELECT 'INSTR-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_INSTR_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO INSTR ( INSTR_ID, INSTR_LGN_ID, INSTR_LGN_PW, INSTR_LGN_SLT_PW, INSTR_NM, INSTR_PN, INSTR_ML, INSTR_BRT_DT, INSTR_ADRS, INSTR_RGST_DT, INSTR_UPDT_DT, INSTR_DEL_DT, INSTR_DEL_YN, INSTTN_ID, CMCD_ID, INSTR_LGN_IP, INSTR_LST_PW_MDFY_DT, INSTR_LST_LGN_DT, INSTR_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT, INSTR_LGN_FAIL_CNT, INSTR_LGN_YN, INSTR_BLK_YN ) VALUES( #{instrId}, #{instrLgnId}, #{instrLgnPw}, #{instrLgnSltPw}, #{instrNm}, #{instrPn}, #{instrMl}, TO_DATE(#{instrBrtDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{instrAdrs}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, 'N', #{insttnId}, #{cmcdId}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, 'N', 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT INSTR_ID, INSTR_LGN_ID, INSTR_LGN_PW, INSTR_LGN_SLT_PW, INSTR_NM, INSTR_PN, INSTR_ML, INSTR_BRT_DT, INSTR_ADRS, INSTR_RGST_DT, INSTR_UPDT_DT, INSTR_DEL_DT, INSTR_DEL_YN, INSTTN_ID, CMCD_ID, INSTR_LGN_IP, INSTR_LST_PW_MDFY_DT, INSTR_LST_LGN_DT, INSTR_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT, INSTR_LGN_FAIL_CNT, INSTR_LGN_YN, INSTR_BLK_YN FROM INSTR WHERE INSTR_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE INSTR SET INSTR_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT = SYSDATE , INSTR_LGN_FAIL_CNT= INSTR_LGN_FAIL_CNT + 1 WHERE INSTR_LGN_ID= #{_parameter}
UPDATE INSTR SET INSTR_BLK_YN = 'Y' WHERE INSTR_LGN_ID = #{_parameter} AND INSTR_LGN_FAIL_CNT >= 5
UPDATE INSTR SET INSTR_LGN_FAIL_CNT = 0 , INSTR_LST_LGN_DT = SYSDATE , INSTR_LGN_IP = NULL , INSTR_LGN_YN = 'Y' , INSTR_BLK_YN = 'N' WHERE INSTR_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
UPDATE INSTR SET INSTR_DEL_YN = 'Y', INSTR_DEL_DT = SYSDATE WHERE INSTR_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.select: SELECT INSTR_ID , INSTR_LGN_ID , INSTR_LGN_PW , INSTR_LGN_SLT_PW , INSTR_NM , INSTR_PN , INSTR_ML , INSTR_BRT_DT , INSTR_ADRS , INSTR_RGST_DT , INSTR_UPDT_DT , INSTR_DEL_DT , INSTR_DEL_YN , CMCD_ID , INSTTN_ID FROM INSTR WHERE INSTR_DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT i.INSTR_NM FROM INSTR i INNER JOIN CRS_INF ci ON ci.INSTR_ID = i.INSTR_ID WHERE ci.CRS_INF_ID = #{crsInfId}
